snippet: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that the deficit in May totaled $130 billion after a surplus of $106.9 billion in April.
abstract: Treasury Dept says government's monthly budget returned to a deficit in May totally $130 billion after a surplus of $106.9 billion in April..
lead_paragraph: The Treasury Department said on Wednesday that the deficit in May totaled $130 billion after a surplus of $106.9 billion in April.

headline.main: Monthly Deficit Returns After Surplus in April
headline.print_headline: Monthly Deficit Returns After Surplus in April
